thread.title: Is Robert Pattinson Ending Engagement to FKA twigs over Fame Hunger?
thread.title_full: Is Robert Pattinson Ending Engagement to FKA twigs over Fame Hunger?

title: Is Robert Pattinson Ending Engagement to FKA twigs over Fame Hunger?
text:
Is Robert Pattinson Ending Engagement to FKA twigs over Fame Hunger? Comment 0 Subscribe to Newsletter! 
This relationship is always under a microscope and the rumor mill seems to be hard at work causing a mass of confusion on whether British sweethearts Robert Pattinson and FKA twigs are still an engaged item. 
The two have repeatedly tried to keep details surrounding their engagement and nuptials on the hush-hush. A few months ago PEOPLE Magazine revealed through a source the twosome had postponed their wedding due to an indecisive bride - she could not decide in the type of wedding she wanted. Like Us on Facebook 
Celebrity Dirty Laundry recently attributed FKA's wedding dilemma as an indicator of her "hunger for fame" - the real reason behind their supposed split. 
"Twigs' changing attitude has been a key part of why they initially delayed their wedding," it said. "Robert noticed that FKA Twigs, born Tahliah Debrett Barnett, went from wanting a small, pub-style wedding to a grand spectacle filled with her new celebrity pals." 
While other outlets suggested Robert's busy film schedule has distanced him from the "Two Weeks" singer. PEOPLE 's insiders reported the two were barely speaking and the wedding was off the agenda. Further corroborating a suspicion that the Twilight hunk was getting closer to his "World War Z" co-star Sienna Miller. 
Star Magazine reported "They're spending a lot of time hanging out in each other's trailers and often meet up for late-night pub runs," the source reportedly claimed. "The cast and crew are picking up on the mutual attraction." The magazine further edged the two had terrible fights, with Pattinson threatening to end their relationship and the eclectic singer daring him to do it. 
However Gossip Cop , known for debunking the rumor mill, has determined the supposed split to be a complete rumor with "no truth" to it. The policing website bashes Celebrity Dirty Laundry along with others saying, "CDL has a terrible habit of publishing grossly inaccurate stories about Pattinson. Still, Gossip Cop investigates every story, regardless of how poor a website's track record is. In any event, we're exclusively told by a source close to the situation there's simply "no truth" to the newest claim that FKA Twigs' so-called "hunger for fame" is causing problems between her and Pattinson." 
So it seems, the two are still together, for now... Contribute to this Story:
